attributes.action: Deport All Foreign Criminals Without Any Consideration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of foreign people in this country is getting beyond a joke. I witness a number of them breaking the law on a daily basis. STOP letting them get away with criminal activity and deport them immediately upon conviction. Its about time these people lived by our rules and the Government did something about it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
